title: Pane e Marmellata
description: Vegan organic B&B situated in an old farmhouse in the countryside of the tiny island of Gozo. Quiet location next to the crystal water sea. Offers a place to relax in a sea view terrace and in the garden with pool purified by salt. Vegan self production of raw butter, milk, cheese, bread, pasta, cake, and fresh fruit juice. Raw vegan options available, and lunch and dinner on request.
